Text.Page:
Hey, have you run into anyone named Mallon? He's an arcanist.

He's also my brother...and none too bright.

No? Okay. Well, if you run into him, will you tell him I'm looking for him? I'd really appreciate it.

Hmm? Felion's looking for me? Again?

She needs to understand that just because she's older doesn't mean she knows everything!

I'm actually hiding here so she can't find me and interrupt my work. I have very important work to do, you know.
